description:
Zenka is one of the most flexible personal loan platform on the market, giving Ugandans more control over their finances with its unique features. We offer a simple registration and application process. After positive approval decision, you will receive your loan straight to your MTN or Airtel Mobile Money account.
Money on your account even in just 5 minutes!

The MoMo app makes managing money simple by putting all your banking needs in one place. You can send and receive money—both locally and globally. It makes shopping, paying bills and topping up mobile services effortless. Get loans and advances fast and easily deposit or CashOut. Safe and user-friendly, the MoMo app helps you handle your money smoothly, making it the go-to-choice for MoMo customers internationally. Now available for download in Ghana.

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Equity mobile has revolutionised digital banking. This app gives you complete control of your financial and lifestyle needs. Simply view your balances, pay your bills, buy airtime, send money and so much more, all from one convenient platform. 

With Equity mobile, you will be able to:

Conveniently and securely do your banking
- Open a bank account in an instant
- Create your profile from the comfort of your home at any time
- Have a full view of your accounts, balances and transactions
- Download account statements and transaction receipts
- Lost your card? Block it temporarily

Grow
- Borrow with ease
- View and pay your loan balances

Transact on the go
- Send money 
-- To your own or other Equity accounts
-- To other banks, locally or internationally
-- To mobile money
-- To your prepaid or credit card(s)

- Pay with Equity
-- Pay your bills
-- Buy goods 
-- Pay to an M-PESA till

- Buy airtime
- Save people and businesses to your list of favourites 

Quick and easy access
- Sign-in with fingerprint or facial recognition
- Change the app to your preferred language (we support English, French, Kinyarwanda, Swahili and 中文)

Britam Mobile comes with an intuitive and smart design that gives you unmatched experience as you access our services from the palm of your hands.

Download the app and enjoy. . .
1. View your account details
2. Raise Request to an agent
3. Shop Online
4. Make a claim
5. Make payment
6. Locate branches
7. Pension Products
8. Amc Products
9. Life Products

The new NSSF application is out. It makes it easy to access NSSF services instantly.
It allows you to access your E-Statement and monitor your transactions at NSSF. The app is simple to use and provides you a convenient, easy and safe way to contact NSSF anytime and anywhere.

NSSF GO Mobile App Allows you to:
- View your NSSF E-Statement
- Call NSSF Helpline numbers directly
- View your current Balance and Last transaction
- Project future NSSF balances based on different interest rates
- View Full member profile
- View NSSF news articles and updates
- Locate all the NSSF branches in your close proximity.

*Terms and Conditions apply. 
*Standard network charges may apply as you may be charged by your service provider for mobile or internet use.

Fast, transparent personal loans for UAE residents 
 
CashNow lets you secure an instant loan straight from your phone. Our simple 5-step application process can be completed in under five minutes and you can receive funds in their bank account within minutes after approval. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

What makes CashNow stand out? 

Real speed – apply, get a decision, and get approved - on the same day. 

Fixed, easy pricing – AED 150 processing fee plus a flat 6 % interest for the full three-month term. No hidden extra charges. 

Licensed & regulated – CashNow (Quantix Technologies) is licensed by the Central Bank of the UAE 

Paper-free – just your Emirates ID and basic details; no credit documents or bank documents 

Full control – track disbursement, repayment dates, and loan balance inside the app. 

Data security – Your personal information is safe with us.  

Options for everyone: We have variety of lending options from small loans starting from AED 100 to upto AED 30,000. Your repayment history and your credit behaviour can unlock various limits for you.  

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Simple cost example 
 

You choose to borrow AED 1,500 at a 3 month tenure:  
→ we deposit AED 1,350 in your account after deducting the AED 150 fee 
→ repay AED 530 each month for three months (total AED 1,590) 

Your repayment amount is fixed on day one—no surprises later. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Eligibility 

→ UAE residents aged 20 – 55 
→ Valid Emirates ID 
→ Regular monthly income 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

How to get your quick loan 

→ Download & install CashNow (it’s free). 
→ Sign up and KYC with Emirates ID  
→ Choose how much you need.  
→ Submit—fill out some basic details and submit. You get a near instant decision on your application 

Receive the money in your bank account if approved, usually within minutes. 
 

That’s it—no branch visits, no paperwork. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ 

Is CashNow safe? 
Yes. We are a licensed and regulated entity by Central Bank of UAE and comply with all UAE lending regulations. 

Can I repay early? 
Absolutely. Early settlement is allowed at any time with a small fee.  

What if I’m declined? 
Our risk algorithm updates frequently so make sure to keep applying every few days!! 
Your application status will not reflect your credit score. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Download CashNow today and solve your cash needs—fast, fair, and fully transparent. 

*T&C Apply

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Fido is licensed by the Bank of Ghana, Bank of Uganda and the National Credit Regulator (South Africa). We create opportunities for growth in Africa by changing the way individuals and entrepreneurs create, manage and build wealth. Enjoy instant financial services, such as access to business credit, savings,  personal credit, and easy, cost-effective payments.
Build your financial track record with Fido Score to take control over your finances and unlock improved offerings from Fido and our partners.

Here's what we offer:
- Fido Business: Boost your business growth with Fido Biz Loans, offering up to GHS 5,000 to move your business forward.
- Fido Score: Build your financial track record and control of your finances with Fido Score. Take actions to improve your Fido Score and unlock improved offerings.
- Fido Savings: Put your money to work and prepare for your future with our high-interest savings product.
- Personal Credit: Get  an instantly pre-approved GHC100-4,000 credit line to meet your needs. It's fast, simple and transparent.
- Fido Payments: Pay bills, buy data, and airtime effortlessly. Each purchase improves your Fido Score.

Here's how to sign up to Fido:
- Download the Fido App and register only once.
- Confirm your details with a valid ID (NIN / Ghana Card) and an address.
- You must be over the age of 18.
- Complete the Fido Score assessment.
- If you are a business, complete you business information.
- Kindly note Minimum Repayment period: 90 days and Maximum Repayment period: 365 days.
- We accept MTN, ATT & Vodafone Mobile Money wallets.

Here's how to repay:


Ghana:
- Log into the Fido App, select the 'Make a Payment' button and follow the prompts.
- You can also dial *998# to repay.
- For other options like using the MTN, AirtelTigo and Vodafone menus, find the repayment process in the Fido App 'Help' section.


Uganda:
Via the Fido App: Log in and tap "Pay Back", then follow the prompts.
Via Mobile Money:

- Airtel: Dial *185*9#, enter Merchant ID: 4312373
- MTN Dial *165*4*4#, enter Merchant Code: fido1

Quick payments via USSD:
- Dial *284*300#
- Confirm your payment with your PIN


Beware of Fraudsters:
- Don't pay any deposits to any agents, Fido is a 100% mobile app!
- Don't use a mobile money number that does not belong to you.
- Don't use someone else's Ghana Card.
- Don't apply for someone else.


Fido personal credit and business loans are intended to assist entrepreneurs and individuals with their everyday needs and not to service long-term debt obligations. Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) is 36%. Actual rates may be lower, depending on local applicable laws and regulations. This is based on a credit line term of 365 days (one year), an interest of 0.098% per day or 2.94% per month, a processing fee of 295 GHS per credit line, and in certain cases, a deductible commitment fee of up to 1.6%.

Representative Example in Ghana Cedi:
A borrower who receives credit of 2,000 GHS for a 365 days term, will be charged an interest rate of 0.098% per day, thus 408.7 GHS in 365 days, and a processing fee of 295 GHS, summing up to a total repayment of 703.7 GHS. A deductible 1.4% commitment fee is applied, and 28 GHS will be deducted from the principal.

‏In summary: 2,000 GHS (borrowed amount), minus 28 GHS (commitment fee) + 408.7 GHS (interest) + 295 GHS (processing fee) = 2,703.7 GHS (total payment).
The borrower has the flexibility to make early repayments at any point, thereby reducing the above-stated interest.

+233-0596922420 / www.fidocredit.com

We are certified by the Data Protection Commission and hold an ISO 27001 certification.

Find out more: https://www.fidocredit.com/legal-pages/privacy-policy-statement

Is Exness Trade the feature-rich trading app you have been waiting for? We think so. Access the world’s financial markets and trade stocks, gold and more … wherever, whenever. Get the Exness Trade trading app now.


AN ONLINE TRADING APP LIKE NO OTHER
Control your online trading accounts with ease, even when you are away from your desktop. With the Exness Trade trading app, you can:
• Trade stocks, gold, oil, indices and more
• Get essential notifications about your balance, trading activity and more
• View your open, pending and closed trades
• Open an unlimited number of new accounts on the trading app
• Test and improve your online trading skills on your free demo account
• Chat to our live in-app support 24/7
• Strategise and spot your next trade using our free market news and analysis


ABOUT OUR TRADING APP PLATFORM
The Exness Trade trading app features a state-of-the-art trading terminal. Users feel right at home on Exness Trade as this advanced trading app delivers the advanced functionality they love, and so much more.
• Open your live and risk-free demo accounts quickly and easily
• Trade hundreds of popular tradable assets on the Exness Trade trading app
• Add your favourite assets to the Watchlist and trade when you see an opportunity
• Use advanced charting to analyse market trends. 
• Stay on top of the markets with price alerts & notifications.
• Control your risk with a range of trading tools.
• Enjoy stable pricing even when you trade in volatile markets

*"Best spreads" means the tightest and most stable spreads. "Most stable" refers to the lowest maximum spreads, and "tightest" refers to the tightest average spreads – offered on Exness Pro accounts – for the above-mentioned instruments. These are compared to spreads across commission-free accounts of other top brokers over the specified period.
*Payment processing times may vary depending on the chosen provider. 


WHAT YOU CAN TRADE ON THE TRADING APP
At Exness, you'll find a wide range of top tradable assets on our platforms including metals, stocks, oil and indices.


*Trading is risky. T&Cs apply.

¹At Exness, over 98% of withdrawals are processed automatically. "Fastest withdrawals" refers to a comparison of Exness’ withdrawal processing time vs. 3 other brokers, last updated on 07.05.2025. Processing times may vary depending on the chosen payment method.

¹USOIL spread reduction refers to average spreads on Pro accounts, sampled over the first full trading week of May 2024 vs. the last full trading week of August 2025.

¹On Pro accounts comparing last trading week of 07.2024 vs. the last trading week of 08.2025.
²Delays and slippage may occur. No guarantee of execution speed or precision is provided.


ABOUT EXNESS
Founded in 2008, Exness is a regulated multi-asset broker that provides the most advanced online trading solutions to traders from around the world. Known for consistently delivering better-than-market conditions to its clients, Exness also pushes the boundaries of online trading services through the development of standout features such as Stop Out Protection, Price Gap Protection, the Exness Trade trading app and other innovations.

Exness Global Limited

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.  

Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

Mangu(MNG) -  является инновационным пикселем, с правовой точки зрения законодательства Республики Узбекистан выражающим рекламу, а по возможностям и движению считается первой виртуальной электронной биржевой облигацией, цифровым активом. При этом предприниматели и владельцы Брендов посредством юридического договора путем денежного перечисления в отдельном порядке, а физические лица, ознакомившись с условиями публичной оферты, посредством регистрации, путем внесения денежных средств в электронный кошелек,  могут купить пиксели. Физические лица на основе средств, поступивших от перепродаж пикселей  Mangu, могут внести оплату за продукцию и услуги Брендов, расположенных на платформе «Mangu – Innovation» или в режиме онлайн Биржи могут посредством других участников обналичить пиксели.

Little Pesa is duly Licensed and Regulated by the Central Bank of Kenya and is also approved Data Processor and Data Controller by the Data Protection Commissioner.  
Little Pesa is a unique App having 3 Products.
	Short-Term Loan Limits up to Ksh 200,000
	•	 Loan Tenures is 7 days, 15 days, 30 days and 62 Days, interest is charged according to the loan tenure chosen. 
	•	Most Competitive Interest Rates—for 7 days loan interest is just 4.75% flat.
	•	3 Top ups available within your loan limit 
	•	No Security/Guarantee required!
	•	No Processing Charges!
	•	No hidden charges—only Ksh 60 is charged as M-Pesa disbursal charges.
	•	Earn Loyalty points equal to 1% of the loan amount  on every loan paid on or before the due date.
	•	Refer & Earn – Share Little Pesa App with your friends or colleagues and earn Ksh 1,000 per reference and your referee also earn Ksh 500 upon paying his/her first loan by the due date. 
	Flexipay Loan Limits up to Ksh 300,000
	•	Loan Repayment spread over 3- 12 months to make it affordable to you.
        •	Earn Loyalty points equal to 0.5% of the loan installment paid on or before the due date.
	•	Option to choose your desired date of payment.
	•	Most competitive Interest Rates—for 12 months loan interest is just 4.5% p.m
	Product Financing Loan Limits up to Ksh 300,000
	•	Loan Repayment spread over 3- 12 months to make it affordable to you.
	•	Option to choose your desired date of payment.
	•	Only 10% Down payment required.
        •	Earn Loyalty points equal to 0.5% of the loan installment paid on or before the due date.
	•	Most competitive Interest Rates—for 12 months loan interest is just 3.5% p.m
	•	Reputed suppliers tied up to meet your product requirements.
  Eligibility Requirements
	•	A salaried Kenyan citizen of 18 years and above having an active Safaricom number duly registered with M -Pesa.
	•	Copy of National ID
	•	Copy of latest Payslip
	•	For availing Flexipay and Product Financing Loan limits, 3 months Bank Statement/ M-Pesa Statement 
Privacy:
We take your privacy very seriously! No control over your M-Pesa PIN and/or Mobile contacts. Your personal data is never shared without your consent. We are approved Data Processor and Data Controller by the Data Protection Commissioner. For more information please refer to our privacy policy https://littlepesa.com/privacy-policy-2/ 
Contact Us
	•	Email: info@littlepesa.com
	•	Call/Chat: 0746 510 778 / 0746 510 781 / 0710 490 126
	•	Website: https://littlepesa.com

developer: The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited
description:
Your money, your way

Easily track your finances, discover tools and features to help you manage your money, and explore personalised offers – all at your fingertips.

Effortless day-to-day banking

• Quick payments and transfers: Send money with ease
• Top up instantly: Buy airtime, data, SMS bundles, and electricity
• Send money vouchers: Share cash vouchers to anyone with a cellphone
• Hassle-free international payments: Make global transactions in just a few taps
• Play Lotto: Try your luck directly from the app

Take control of your money

• Open a savings account online: Start saving in minutes
• Manage your cards: Set payment limits, stop or replace cards quickly
• Access documents on-demand: Get stamped statements, bank letters and tax certificates
• Quick balance checks: View your balances without signing in
• Track insurance claims: Submit and monitor your building insurance claims easily

Everything you need, all in one place

• One view of all your accounts: See all your Standard Bank accounts in one convenient place
• Manage your loans: Handle your personal, vehicle and home loans with ease
• Get vehicle loan pre-approval: Apply for pre-approval in just a few taps
• Link your accounts to trading: Manage your share trading profile directly from the app
• Monitor your investments: View your Stanlib investments anytime, anywhere

Note: Availability of some features may vary depending on your region.

Your app will automatically update to ensure you always have the latest features and security upgrades.

Getting started

Simply download the app using data (charges apply for the initial download), but once you’re set-up, there are no data charges when using the app. As long as you have a connection, your banking is ready to go!

Transactional features are available to Standard Bank accounts held in South Africa, Ghana, Uganda, Botswana, Zimbabwe, Zambia, Tanzania, Lesotho, Malawi, eSwatini and Namibia. Keep in mind that some types of payments include transaction fees.  

Legal info  

The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited is a licensed financial services provider in terms of the Financial Advisory and Intermediary Services Act; and is a registered credit provider in terms of the National Credit Act, registration number NCRCP15.  

Stanbic Bank Botswana Limited is a Company (registration number: 1991/1343) incorporated in the Republic of Botswana and a registered commercial bank. Namibia: Standard Bank is a licensed banking institution in terms of the Banking Institutions Act, registration number 78/01799. Stanbic Bank Uganda Limited is regulated by the Bank of Uganda.

Do you need urgent cash? Look no further, Urgent10k has got you covered! We will provide you with the cash you need in an instant. 


RATES AND REQUIREMENTS 

To qualify for our loans, one must be above 21 years of age and must be employed with a steady income. You may be required to submit your bank statement and a valid ID. You can get as little as N5,000 and up to N100,000 and you can pay back between 60 to 180 days. Our usual repayment period is monthly. Our interest rate, a maximum of 3% per month, is determined by our credit scoring algorithm. This comes to an Annual Percentage Rate (APR) of 36%.

FOR EXAMPLE;
If you get a personal loan product of N10,000 to pay back over a 2-months tenor at an interest rate and fees of 3% per month (36% APR), you will be paying back N600 in interest. Making your total Principal + Interest repayment of N10,600 only.

We usually require no collateral, guarantors, or documents. However, for loans beyond certain amounts, we may require additional documentation. Nevertheless, all you need is to download our app and apply right from your mobile phone.


WANT TO TALK TO US?

You could reach out to us on our various social media platforms or email us at support@urgent10k.ng to share your feedback, thoughts and requests! Or better still call us on +234 913 711 0506 we’d love to hear from you so we can know how to make our services better for you.

The urgent10k app is powered by UGT Technologies Limited.


BORROW RESPONSIBLY

When processing your loan request for eligibility, we look at several signals, such as your credit score, past loan performance, etc. We require that loan applications be filled with the correct information as any falsification could delay your loan request, or you may be blacklisted. In addition, for cases of fraud, you may be reported to the authorities.

Earn higher commission through faster transaction processing, Increased foot traffic with better customer service, Better user experience while serving your customers, Easily sell more value added services to increase your commission.

Furaha’s school fee loan is targeting the “missing middle” customer segment in Uganda. The loan product is provided to parents to help them pay school fees for their children at the beginning of school term and spread repayments throughout the term so that children learn uninterrupted. At Furaha, we are more than a financial solution – we are your partner on the journey to a brighter tomorrow.
 
Applying for a loan can be challenging, as each bank has its own specific requirements and approval procedures. Furthermore, setting up an account typically requires thorough research, extensive paperwork, and verification, which can be both tedious and time-consuming. Furaha streamlines the entire process by providing a smooth, digital, and stress-free solution to your financial requirements.
 
Furaha partners with licensed commercial banks in Uganda to select the best bank for you and facilitate direct lending. Funds are promptly disbursed to schools, ensuring you receive the necessary financial support swiftly and efficiently.
 
Loan Terms:
Minimum Loan Tenor of 90 days
Maximum Loan Tenor of 90 days
Minimum Loan Amount of UGX 200K
Maximum Loan Amount of UGX 2M
Loan processing fee of 3% charged on disbursed amount
Interest of 5% per month charged on the booked loan amount
Maximum annual percentage rate (APR) of seventy four percent.
Late repayment penalty of 2.5% on the overdue amount
Weekly or Monthly instalment options
 
Loan Term Example:
Loan Amount of UGX 1M, payable over 90 days
Total fees of 3% of UGX 1M and interest 5% per month for 3 months is UGX 184,500
Total Amount Payable will be UGX 1,184,500 (Principal, Fees and Interest)
3-equal monthly instalment payable amount will be UGX 394,833
 
Join our educational community. Become a part of a community that values education and supports each other's aspirations. When you choose Furaha school fees financing, you're not just getting a loan; you're gaining a partner in your child's education journey. Let's build brighter futures together!

Send and receive money the fast, free and easy way. Transfer funds across town or across Africa, right from your mobile phone.


What is Chipper Cash?
Chipper Cash is a cross-border payments app, where over 3 million people send & receive money in and between Nigeria, South Africa, Ghana, Uganda, Rwanda, Tanzania, and now available in United Kingdom (UK). Enjoy free local transfers and the lowest cross-border rates. 

Chipper Cash is bringing Africa together, one transaction at a time. Everyday we “chip away” at the financial problems facing people across Africa & around the world.  


Send & Receive Money
Just say no to massive fees or traveling to a bank or agent just to send and receive money. Instantly transfer between your accounts for free. Get paid faster, with zero fees! 

No-Fee Money Transfers
Move your money between Chipper Cash and any bank, mobile money account absolutely free!

Buy Discounted Airtime & Earn Cashback
Purchase discounted Airtime and earn 2% or more CashBack instantly. Get Airtime for yourself, or send to a friend, even send it internationally! 

Pay Bills Instantly for Free
Pay bills with no extra fees charged. Chipper Bill Pay is so easy, that you may even start paying your friend's bills. Bills are a hassle, Chipper is simple, easy and free. 

Earn with Chipper
Earn cash by sharing Chipper with friends and colleagues. They get a cash bonus too. No limits!
 
Pay Anyone / Get Paid, Instantly
Run a business and need to pay local and international suppliers? Pay instantly with Chipper and save big on transaction fees. 

Shopping online for the perfect accessory, pay with Chipper and get those dream items without the nightmare fees.

Studying abroad and need tuition and pocket money from home? Chipper saves your family money and you get the funds instantly. 

Stay informed
Chipper is constantly expanding. Keep updated on the latest features, deals and countries
